title: `onPrepareOptionsMenu` not run on first tab switch in statistics
body:
### Checklist

- [X] I have used the search function for [**OPEN**](https://github.com/AntennaPod/AntennaPod/issues) issues to see if someone else has already submitted the same bug report.
- [X] I have **also** used the search function for [**CLOSED**](https://github.com/AntennaPod/AntennaPod/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aclosed) issues to see if the problem is already solved and just waiting to be released.
- [X] I will describe the problem with as much detail as possible.
- [X] If the bug only to occurs with a certain podcast, I will include the URL of that podcast.

### App version

commit 99a6c96

### Android version

15

### Device model

sdk_gphone64_x86_64 (Emulator in Android Studio)

### First occurred

At least 3.6.1f (8ec7d08e2) onwards, might've been happening longer

### Steps to reproduce

1. Open subscriptions tab
2. Open statistics page
3. Select either of the other tabs (Years/Downloads)

### Expected behaviour

Filter button disappears, Reset option disappears for downloads tab, stays for years tab.

### Current behaviour

Filter button remains, but is non-functional. "Reset statistics data" seems to be functional.
Appears to work normally on subsequent tab switches.

I noticed this on my own phone (FP4 with A13 and latest fdroid release) and replicated with the emulator in Android Studio with latest git (see screen recording)

[2025-01-15 00:30.webm](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6a21aa08-7e9d-4d89-aa98-8abcdab79265)


### Logs

_No response_
